com.illcode.meterman.impl

Interface RoomDelegate

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RoomDelegateAdapter

    public interface RoomDelegate
    An interface that allows you to proxy calls to certain methods of a BaseRoom.
    See Also:
    RoomDelegateAdapter

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void entered(BaseRoom r, Room fromRoom)
      Called when the player has entered the room.
      boolean exiting(BaseRoom r, Room toRoom)
      Called as the player is exiting the room (but is still there).
      String getDescription(BaseRoom r) 
      List<Entity> getRoomEntities(BaseRoom r) 

    • Method Detail

      • getDescription

        String getDescription(BaseRoom r)
        See Also:
        Room.getDescription()

      • entered

        void entered(BaseRoom r,
           Room fromRoom)
        Called when the player has entered the room.
        Parameters:
        r - the room for which we're the delegate
        fromRoom - the room (possibly null) from which the player entered
        See Also:
        Room.entered(Room)

      • exiting

        boolean exiting(BaseRoom r,
              Room toRoom)
        Called as the player is exiting the room (but is still there).
        Parameters:
        r - the room for which we're the delegate
        toRoom - the room the player is attempting to move to.
        Returns:
        true to block the player from exiting, false to allow the exit (note that the exit may fail for other reasons)
        See Also:
        Room.exiting(Room)

      • getRoomEntities

        List<Entity> getRoomEntities(BaseRoom r)
        See Also:
        Room.getRoomEntities()
